title: Lists of Legends: Champion Teasers You Might’ve Missed, Part One

replies.body: {{champion:64}} I didn't see this coming.
{{champion:37}} ...
Ok.{{champion:33}}
I knew you would, well, not say that.
{{champion:26}} I knew you were going to say that
{{champion:126}} hopefully more will come in the future. Maybe even tomorrow.
i literally lol'd
I thought you figuratively lol'd
{{champion:33}} Ok.
Best reveal was Vi. She didn't even get a reveal she just kicked open the door and said "What up I'm here let's party".
"punched through the door"

What? Door? 

"Punches through the wall" :P
"Sometimes, you've got to **MAKE** a door." {{champion:254}}
Punch first. Get revealed after punching. {{champion:254}}
why is{{champion:143}} naked?
are you complaining?
When is she ever not?
***Thorny***
You be having dem nosebleeds.
***Rosebleeds.***
Let's never forget Xerath. His reveal was pretty awesome.
That Zyra though.{{champion:143}}
Is it bad that I just noticed that she has four ears?
No, because i did to, right after reading that comment i looked and she does. scary
i still didn't notice 'til i read your comment...
It's cool to see these see those old pictures but I believe you missed one Riot. Their name was Ao Shin [](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3844771)
{{champion:45}} You shall not pass >:o
I'm still waiting for Caitlyn to catch that outlaw that keeps leaving the letter "C" at all of his crime scenes.
I'm assuming they looked good? {{champion:64}}
I think that joke is getting old... {{champion:26}}
what are you {{champion:14}} ?
The best place to hide a champion teaser is in a article of champion teasers! I'm onto you riot o-o
{{champion:238}}  the unseen teaser is the deadliest {{champion:238}}
It may be a picture of {{champion:143}} , but dat {{champion:22}} ...
when i tilt my head a bit...i still can't figure out what you were trying to make
looks like a Mario to me
By far my favorite
What about the Ao'Shin teaser? Anyone remember?
The Mythical dragon, yeah, been waiting on that one.
coming soon, aka 2015.
Why not focus on getting your servers better?
Believe it or not, they have.  Late S1 - early S2 their servers were down every other week.  No system will be perfect, but they have made great improvements in their server stability.
Zed so swagg {{champion:238}}
That was secretly a sneak peek of improved URF :P 100% CDR TIME B*TCH {{champion:222}}
At the rate they're going with champion releases, Gnar is gonna be the last one of 2014.
Gnar{{champion:64}} Teasers ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ

Badass Mexican Graves. Never forget.

Also, I have to say I like how what before was called a misscommunication between the art department and the development team, now is caled "before and after".
